items.label: Memory / CPU profiles
items.help: What machine types are available to users?

Essential.text:
Fixed configuration for all users, e.g.,
- ▸ 2GB , 1 CPU

Advanced.text:
Multiple CPU/RAM choice availble to each user, e.g.,
- ▸ 2 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 4 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 16 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 64 GB RAM, up to 16 CPUs

Configurable for group based allocations.

Premier.text:
Multiple CPU/RAM choice availble to each user, e.g.,
- ▸ 2 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 4 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 16 GB RAM, up to 4 CPUs
- ▸ 64 GB RAM, up to 16 CPUs

Configurable for group based allocations.
